label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Added a new loading screen
  • Random DraftMode hero pool count increased from 20 to 22
  • Recipe items no longer sell for 80% of their price (now 50% like regular items)
  • Added a 1 second cooldown to placingObserver and Sentry Wards(to help prevent accidental usage when lagging)

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml:
• Armor decreased by 2
  • Aphotic Shieldcooldown decreased from 14/12/10/8 to 12/10/8/6
  • Borrowed Timecooldown now scales from 60 to 60/50/40
  • Death Coilcooldown decreased from 6 to 5
  • Frostmourneenemy debuff duration increased from 2 to 2.5

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Acid Spraydamage per second increased from 8/16/24/32 to 14/20/26/32
  • Acid Spray mana cost from 160 to 130/140/150/160
  • Chemical RageBase Attack Time decreased from 1.45/1.3/1.15 to 1.4/1.2/1
  • Goblin's Greedcounter duration increased from 20 to 25 seconds
  • Goblin's Greed bonus gold scaling adjusted from 2/4/6/8 + 2 to 4/6/8/10 + 1/2/3/4
  • Unstable Concoctionmax damage increased from 130/200/270/340 to 150/220/290/360
  • Unstable Concoction no longer displays the countdown numbers to enemies
  • Unstable Concoction always affects a 175 area around where it explodes
    • This includes when it explodes on Alchemist

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:
• Chilling Touchnow deals its bonus damage and uses a charge when attacking creeps
  • Chilling Touch AoE increased from 450 to 525
  • Chilling Touch damage increased from 40/50/60/70 to 50/60/70/80
  • Chilling Touch duration reduced from 40 to 30
  • Ice Blastis no longerdispelledby theFountain

label: Anti-Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed decreased from 320 to 315
  • Blinkanimation time increased from 0.33 to 0.4
  • Legs decreased from 2/2/2/2 to 1/1.5/1.8/1.9

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's Callbonus armor increased from 30 to 40
  • Battle Hungerslow decreased from 10% to 8%
  • Battle Hunger movement bonus increased from 4% to 8% per affected enemy
  • Counter Helixdamage increased from 100/130/160/190 to 100/135/170/205

label: Bane
descriptionHtml:
• Fiend's GripAghanim's duration increased from 6 to 7
  • Enfeebledamage reduction increased from 25/50/75/100 to 30/60/90/120
  • Enfeeble can no longer be dispelled
    • ByManta,BKB, or any otherdispel

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Cast animation time decreased from 0.3 to 0.2
  • Strength growth increased from 2 to 2.7
  • Turn rateimproved from 0.4 to 1
  • Fireflyduration increased from 15 to 18 seconds
  • Firefly damage trail no longer instantly disappears when Batrider dies

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Blood Bathdeath detection AoE for enemy heroes increased from 225 to 325
  • Bloodragebonus base damage from 20/40/60/80% to 30/60/90/120%
  • ThirstAOE from 1500/3000/4500/6000 to 6000
  • Thirst MS bonus from 11/22/33/44% to 15/25/35/45%
  • Thirst HP percentage detection rescaled from constant 40% to 20/30/40/50% HP (invis is half that)

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml: • Primal Splitunits are now affected byBlack Hole

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml:
• Quill Spraydamage cap increased from 220 to 400
  • Warpathdamage per stack increased from 10/15/20 to 20/25/30
  • Warpath base damage increased from 10/20/30 to 20/25/30
  • Fixed how Quill Spray damage threshold works
    • Bristleback will now activate Quill Spray on the instance of damage when its threshold is breached rather than the one after that occurrence

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Spideritebounty increased from 11-13 to 16-21
  • Incapacitating Biteno longer gives 2/4/6/8 bonus damage
  • Incapacitating Bite miss rate increased from 10/15/20/25 to 10/20/30/40

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml: • Double Edgenow deals its damage in a 190 AoE around the target

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml: • Chaos Boltstun is no longer partially undodgeable (now a normal projectile with 1000 speed)

label: Chen
descriptionHtml:
• Holy Persuasionno longer has the ability to teleport allied units
  • Test of Faithnow grants you a secondary ability to teleport allied units
    • Teleports heroes to fountain after a delay
    • Instant teleport for persuaded creeps
    • Delay: 6/5/4/3
    • Cooldown: 24
    • Mana Cost: 200
    • Cast Range: 600

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml: • Strafeattack speed bonus increased from 110 to 130

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml:
• Strength gain increased from 2.4 to 2.7
  • Battery Assaultdamage interval improved from 0.75 to 0.7
  • Power Cogsdamage and mana drain increased from 60/90/120/150 to 80/120/160/200
  • Power Cogs duration increased from 3/4/5/6 to 5/6/7/8
  • Fixed Power Cogs not triggering and burning mana/hp when someone Force Staffs over it

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml: • Freezing Fieldduration increased from 4 to 7 seconds

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed decreased from 305 to 300
  • Vacuumcooldown increased from 16 to 19
  • Vacuum cast range decreased from 550 to 500
  • Vacuum AoE decreased from 275/375/475/575 to 250/350/450/550
  • Vacuum can no longer pull invulnerable units

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml:
• Poison Touchlevel 4 cooldown decreased from 9 to 7
  • Shadow WaveAoE increased from 170 to 185

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml: • Armor increased by 1

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml: • Static Stormmax damage increased from 170/210/250 to 170/220/270

label: Doom
descriptionHtml:
• Devourcreep level restriction removed
  • Devour cooldown from 60/55/50/45 to 70/60/50/40
  • Devour gold from 40/60/80/100 to 25/50/75/100
  • Devour mana cost from 60 to 60/50/40/30
  • Level Deathbonus damage now deals 20% of Max HP instead of a fixed amount
  • Level Death damage increased from 100/150/200/250 to 125/175/225/275
  • Scorched Earthdamage/heal increased from 12/16/20/24 to 12/18/24/30

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Armor decreased by 1
  • Dragon Bloodarmor bonus increased from 2/4/6/8 to 3/6/9/12
  • Elder Dragon Formlevel 2/3 no longer gives bonus damage (was 5/14)
  • Elder Dragon Form level 2/3 splash area rescaled slightly
    • 100% splash AoE changed from 75 to 100
    • 75% splash AoE changed from 150 to 200
    • 50% splash AoE remains the same

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml:
• Frost Arrowsslow increased from 50% to 60% at level 4
  • Marksmanshiplevel 3 agility bonus increased from 45 to 60
  • Trueshot Auradamage bonus increased from 7/14/21/28% to 8/16/24/32%
  • Silencecooldown decreased from 15 to 13

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml: • Enchant Totemcooldown decreased from 7 to 6 seconds

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Ancestral Spiritcan now be controlled, until it starts to return to you
  • Ancestral Spirit movement speed is now equal to Elder Titan's rather than fixed at 455
  • Ancestral Spirit return ability no longer interrupts your hero
  • Ancestral Spirit now has theEcho StompandSpirit Returnabilities it can cast directly
    • This causes your hero to do the echo stomp as well

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Armor decreased by 1
  • Fire Remnantrecharge time increased from 30 to 35 seconds
  • Fire Remnant damage per instance from 120/160/200 to 100/150/200

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Maleficedamage reduced from 30/40/65/80 to 40/40/65/65 (still 1/2/2/3 pulses)
  • Midnight Pulsecast range from 500 to 700
  • Black Holemana cost from 200/300/400 to 250/350/450

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Time Lockdeals twice as much damage when it procs on a target inChronosphere
  • Faceless Void can no longer be frozen by any Chronosphere

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed increased from 305 to 315
  • Flak CannonAoE increased from 800 to 1000
  • Call DownAoE increased from 400 to 450

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Burning Spearsduration increased from 6 to 7
  • Inner Vitalitycan now be cast on magic immune targets
  • Life BreakAghanim's cooldown decreased from 24/16/8 to 4

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml: • Invoker base damage decreased by 4

label: Io
descriptionHtml:
• OverchargeHP/MP cost over time increased from 2.5% to 3.5%
  • Tetherregeneration transfer now heals the Tethered unit at 1.5× the rate of Wisp

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml:
• Facing direction now more accurately matches his turn rate (just a visual change)
  • Liquid FireAoE increased from 175 to 300
  • Ice Pathreworked
    • Now stuns when enemies come in contact with the Ice Path, rather than stunning nearby enemies after Ice Path ends

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml:
• Base attack time decreased from 1.7 to 1.6
  • Omnislashnow kills creeps and neutrals in 1 hit
    • This does not include player controlled units or ancients

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml:
• Chakramana cost rescaled from 40/55/70/85 to 25/45/65/85
  • Mana Leakcooldown decreased from 18 to 16
  • Illuminatecast range changed to be the same as its travel range (just a UI change)
  • Illuminate max hit distance increased from 1600 to 2000

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• Base strength increased by 3
  • Ghost Shipcooldown decreased from 90/80/70 to 60/50/40
  • Ghost Ship impact AoE increased from 400 to 425

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• FixedOverwhelming Oddsgiving 6% instead of 9% movement per hero
  • Overwhelming Odds bonus summoned unit/illusion damage reduced from 50% to 25%
  • Press The Attackcooldown rescaled from 15 to 16/15/14/13

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml: • Diabolic Edictnow uses Leshrac's cast animation time

label: Lich
descriptionHtml: • Frost Novacooldown decreased from 9.25/9.25/9.25/8 to 8

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml: • Rageduration increased from 2.5/3.25/4/4.75 to 3/4/5/6

label: Lina
descriptionHtml:
• Fiery Soulattack speed bonus increased from 40/50/60/70 to 40/55/70/85
  • Laguna Bladecooldown rescaled from 120/90/55 to 90/70/50

label: Lion
descriptionHtml:
• Finger of Deathcooldown rescaled from 150/90/55 to 170/105/40
  • Finger of Death damage increased from 500/650/850 to 600/725/850 (Aghanim's from 600/800/1025 to 725/875/1025)
  • Mana Draininitial cast range increased from 600/650/700/750 to 750
  • Mana Drain threshold range increased from 800 to 850
  • Mana Drain cooldown decreased from 25/20/15/10 to 20/15/10/5

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml:
• Spirit Bearcan no longer be resummoned while it is taking damage
    • Has same duration and rules as his blink disable

label: Luna
descriptionHtml: • Moon Glaivelevel 4 bounce count increased 4 to 5

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml:
• Summon Wolvesmana cost increased from 125 to 145
  • Lycan WolvesHP decreased from 400/450/500/550 to 200/240/280/320
  • Lycan Wolves now have 50% magic resistance
  • FixedShapeshiftspeed buff remaining after dying with Aegis

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml:
• Agility gain increased from 1.8 to 2.5
  • Empowerdamage and cleave bonus increased from 15/25/35/45% to 20/30/40/50%
  • Skewerslow duration increased from 2 to 2.5 seconds

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml:
• Mana Shieldabsorption rate increased from 0.75/1.25/1.5/2 to 0.75/1.25/1.75/2.25
  • Mystic Snakedamage bonus per jump increased from 20% to 25%
  • Split Shotdamage per arrow increased from 45/55/65/75% to 50/60/70/80%

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml:
• Geomancer clones stat sharing increased from 25% to 30%
  • GeostrikeDPS increased from 5/10/15/20 to 7/14/21/28

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml:
• Sacred Arrowcooldown decreased from 25 to 20
  • Starstormsecond single unit impact damage increased from 50% to 75% of the original

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml:
• Cast animation time increased from 0.3 to 0.45
  • Morphmana cost increased from 20 to 30 mana per second
  • Base damage decreased by 6
  • WaveformAoE decreased from 255 to 200
  • Waveform no longer allows you to start attacking/casting before it is completed

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage decreased by 12
  • Cast animation time increased from 0.5 to 0.65

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed decreased from 300 to 295
  • Force of NatureTreant magic resistance decreased from 33% to 20%

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml:
• Death Pulseheal rescaled from 50/75/100/130 to 70/90/110/130
  • Sadistreworked
    • Now grants health and mana for kills, rather than just mana

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased to 2.5
  • Mana Burndrain amount increased from 4×Int to 5×Int
  • Mana Burn mana cost rescaled from 90/110/130/150 to 130/120/110/100
  • Vendettamovement speed increased from 10/15/20% to 16/18/20%
  • Spiked Carapacereworked
    • Now reflects one instance of damage per enemy hero, rather than only the first hero to hit Nyx Assassin

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml:
• Armor increased by 1
  • Aghanim'sUnrefined Fireblastcooldown decreased from 20 to 10
  • Bloodlustcan now target catapults
  • Bloodlust movement speed bonus increased from 6/9/12/15% to 10/12/14/16%

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml: • Degen AuraAoE increased from 300 to 315

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml: • Astral Imprisonmentintelligence steal increased from 2/4/6/8 to 4/6/8/10

label: Pit Lord
descriptionHtml:
• Dark Riftnow has a subability that allows the effect to be canceled before it resolves
    • This does not prevent the cooldown from being used, it only makes it so you no longer have to teleport everyone away
  • Dark Rift now makes its teleportation target a low priority target similar to howBoots of Travelworks
  • ReplacedExpulsionwith a new ability:Atrophy Aura
  • Restored oldFirestorm
    • It is now a non-channeled ability again, and no longer damages buildings

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Coup de Gracecritical strike multiplier increased from 2.5/3.25/4 to 2.5/3.5/4.5

label: Phantom Lancer
descriptionHtml:
• Agility gain increased from 2.8 to 4.2
  • Spirit Lanceslow duration increased from 3 to 3.25 seconds

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage decreased by 6
  • Base strength decreased by 2
  • Base movement speed decreased from 290 to 285
  • Supernovanow refreshes Phoenix's other skills (not items) if the sun survives
  • Fire Spiritsreworked
    • No longer heals Phoenix for the damage dealt
  • Icarus Divereworked
    • No longer disarms enemy units
  • Sun Rayreworked
    • No longer costs a percentage of maximum mana per second

label: Puck
descriptionHtml:
• Dream Coilduration increased from 5 to 6 (Aghanim's from 7 to 8)
  • Illusory OrbAoE increased from 200 to 225
  • Waning Riftdamage increased from 60/120/180/240 to 70/140/210/280
  • FixedPhase Shiftinvulnerability duration ending 0.25 seconds too soon

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed increased from 315 to 320
  • Nether Wardmana flare damage increased from 0.75/1/1.25/1.5 to 1/1.25/1.5/1.75
  • Life Drainbreak range increased from 850 to 900

label: Razor
descriptionHtml:
• Plasma Fieldmin damage reduced from 80/120/160/200 to 60/100/140/180
  • Plasma Field max damage increased from 140/210/280/350 to 160/230/300/370
  • Static Linkno longer breaks if Razor loses vision of the target
  • Static Link can no longer ground target
  • Static Link can now target magic immune (it could before via ground seeking)
  • Unstable Currentpurge duration increased from 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.2 to 0.4/0.8/1.2/1.6

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed decreased from 300 to 290
  • Fade Boltbounce AoE decreased from 500 to 440

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml:
• Soul Catchermana cost increased from 50 to 50/60/70/80
  • Shadow PoisonAoE increased from 150 to 180

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml:
• Necromasteryhero kill soul increment increased from 6 to 12
  • Presence of the Dark Lordarmor reduction improved from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6
  • Requiem of Soulshas a new passive component that triggers upon death
    • Upon dying, half of Shadow Fiend's souls (the amount lost on death) will be released as if you had cast Requiem of Souls
    • This cast is independent of Requiem of Souls

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Strength gain increased from 1.7 to 2.2
  • Global Silenceduration increased from 3/4/5 to 3/4.5/6
  • Last Wordnow always steals 2 intelligence if an enemy hero dies in its AoE

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml: • Concussive Shotcooldown decreased from 20/19/18/17 to 20/18/16/14

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml: • Amplify Damagearmor reduction increased from 8/12/16 to 8/14/20

label: Slark
descriptionHtml:
• Dark Pactcooldown decreased from 10/9/8/7 to 9/8/7/6
  • Shadow DanceHP regen increased from 3/4/5% to 3/5/7%

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml:
• Headshotdamage increased from 30/40/50/60 to 30/45/60/75
  • Take Aimrange bonus increased from 65/130/195/260 to 75/150/225/300
  • ShrapnelAoE increased from 350 to 360
  • Shrapnel duration increased from 8 to 9

label: Spectre
descriptionHtml: • Desolatedamage increased from 20/30/40/50 to 20/35/50/65

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml:
• Base strength increased by 6
  • Damage increased by 9
  • Charge of Darknessno longer gives a buff indicator
  • Charge of Darkness speed increased from 425/500/575/650 to 600/650/700/750
  • Empowering Hasteno longer increases Spirit Breaker's damage
  • Empowering Haste movement bonus aura rescaled from 6/8/10/12% to 6/10/14/18%
  • Greater Bashnow deals damage based on your movement speed (10/20/30/40% of speed)
  • Greater Bash duration increased from 0.95/1.15/1.35/1.55 to 1/1.2/1.4/1.6
  • Fixed Greater Bash not affecting magic immune units

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Static Remnantcooldown decreased from 4 to 3.5

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• Great CleaveAoE increased from 200 to 300
  • Great Cleave damage from 30/40/50/60% to 25/40/55/70%
  • God's Strengthbonus damage increased from 100/140/180% to 100/150/200%
  • WarcryAoE increased from 700 to 900
  • Warcry armor increased from 3/6/9/12 to 4/8/12/16

label: Techies
descriptionHtml:
• Armor increased by 6
  • Land Mine cooldown from 25/20/15/12 to 25/20/15/10

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Psi Bladesno longer spills damage when attacking illusions

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Armor increased by 2
  • Base hp regen increased to 2
  • Sunderis no longer blocked byMagic Immunity
  • Metamorphosisreworked
    • No longer creates illusions automatically
  • Reflectionreworked
    • Now activates on enemies within cast range, rather than enemies that enter a small area of effect
  • Zeal replaced with a new ability:Conjure Image

descriptionHtml:

  • Living Armoris now an active ability, rather than an aura

• Snowballnow carries all Tusk's controlled units as well

• Decaysteal duration increased from 21/24/27/30 to 25/30/35/40

descriptionHtml:
• Cast animation time decreased from 0.5 to 0.3

descriptionHtml: • Damage Returnduration increased from 4 to 4.5 seconds

descriptionHtml: • Charges now increment if you get a kill out of range

label: Daedalus
descriptionHtml: • Critical strike multiplier increased from 2.5 to 2.7

label: Dagon
